mapper.update: update wtm_member m set m.imageUrl = #{imageUrl} where m.id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from wtm_member m WHERE m.telephone=#{cellphone} AND m.password=#{password}
select m.*,s.memberScore,login.openId from wtm_member m LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score s ON s.memberId=m.id LEFT JOIN wtm_third_login login ON login.memberId=m.id WHERE m.memberName=#{memberName}
select * from wtm_member m WHERE m.invitedCode=#{inviteCode}
